name: Casa dos Frios

address.street: Avenida Engenheiro Domingos Ferreira 1920 Boa Viagem
address.full: Avenida Engenheiro Domingos Ferreira 1920 Boa Viagem, Recife, Pernambuco 51111-020

description: We are a hybrid kind of gourmet market which incorporates all the best aspects each including our nationally renowned Bolo de Rolo, an elaborate delicatessen, a grocery store with filled with a variety of imported goods and to top it all off we have a buffet restaurant and a café all in the same place.
